title: Infosys' weak Q4 earnings have a price, brokerages slash targets by 9-13%
summary: Following Infosys' disappointing fourth quarter earnings report, various brokerages have reduced their target prices for the company by 9-13%. This adjustment reflects market response to the tech giant's weaker than expected performance.
content:
Several major brokerages have significantly reduced their target prices for Infosys following the company's weak fourth quarter earnings report. The downward revision, ranging between 9-13%, comes as a direct response to the technology giant's underperformance in Q4.

The news has impacted market sentiment, with implications for other tech sector stocks as well. The development is particularly significant given Infosys' position as one of India's leading IT services companies and its influence on the broader market.

This adjustment in target prices reflects growing concerns about the company's near-term growth prospects and overall market conditions affecting the technology sector.

content.title: Infosys' weak Q4 earnings have a price, brokerages slash targets by 9-13%
content.author: Unknown Author

markdown_content:
## Market Response
Several major brokerages have significantly reduced their target prices for Infosys following the company's weak fourth quarter earnings report. The downward revision, ranging between 9-13%, comes as a direct response to the technology giant's underperformance in Q4.

## Market Impact
The news has impacted market sentiment, with implications for other tech sector stocks as well. The development is particularly significant given Infosys' position as one of India's leading IT services companies and its influence on the broader market.

## Outlook
This adjustment in target prices reflects growing concerns about the company's near-term growth prospects and overall market conditions affecting the technology sector.
